channel.title: Post your very first post from Mopar!
channel.description:
Profile>Posts>Last page Post your first posts ever on Mopar! :) Mine's: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,406085.msg3029945.html#msg3029945
Wrong. It's Hyperion (rs2 framework). We recently converted server bases. Here is our order of how we switched bases: 1) iClarity 1.05 2) Shards 3) Devolution 2.7 4) Hyperion (Grahams rs2 framework) Just letting you know for all the haters or flamers who say it's shards.
It was from OSRemake

Dammit. I guess someone should bump the older topic then. And by bump I don’t mean spam.

item.title: Post your very first post from Mopar!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

297 pages o.O

Help!

Ok, this may seem very noobish, but i am a newb. I dwnloaded a source from Moparscape, then edited some things. When you log in it said "Welcome to *******scape! Owner is… " I went into client.java, then edited it to say “Welcome to DavidScape! Owner is Davidi2!” I saved the JAVA file, but when I loaded the client, nothing changed?? how do I make the changes go into effect!?

and in the same thread:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:242403”]Oh lol… i knew that… also, when ppl start, they are invisible? how do i fix? It also seems that people cant log in again after logging out. I create an account, log it out, try to log it back in, but it says error connecting to server… fix?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2008, 11:06:33 am[/size][hr]also, if i close my client(but keep the server running) open it back up, try to log in, it says that the account it already logged in?!

AM I like, followed by a ghost?? :|[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Post your very first post from Mopar!

item.title: Post your very first post from Mopar!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Wow, 162 pages of posts, go figure.

HELP- something wrong and i cant fig. it out!

When people lag out sometimes it lags the whole server until the server re-start happends or i force re-start it. I cant figure out what wrong. I am new to coding and this is one of the few things i yet cannot do. I have a diferent server i use for a backup running right now. I want to get the old one back running but it sometimes will cause people to lag out repeatedly without being able to stop. Sometimes nulling the server. Please if there is ANY advice u can give please… share…

Now i look at that, and realize, it was a problem with the player-updating. Mainly because i had fixed it back then.

Read full topic
item.source: Post your very first post from Mopar!

item.title: Post your very first post from Mopar!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:1, topic:298225”]Animation question

Alright here it is, I retextured an armor in metasequo.
Initially i converted from dat-> mqo, (with datmaker)

i edited colors in mqo

then back to dat with datmaker.

ingame the model shows up fine, but it completely unanimated.[/quote]
first post… it was in the help section, I am embarrassed.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your very first post from Mopar!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Ok. So I've finished making a custom and saved the correct files and stuff. But I'm just gonna be me and say this flat out...where do I type the "add model ####" code? I tried as a command (Bl00d-Blitz source) but no luck, and i don't exactly comprehend stuff easy, so could someone please tell me where/how to type in "add model ####"? Thanks

Oh yea, if this belongs in the Private Server Hacking forum, could a mod please move it? thanks

Lul.

Read full topic

at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
at server.main(server.java:28)

what do i do when i run my server it comes up with this =s can someone help me plz =D[/quote]

I didn’t even know what a runescape private server was really.

Here is our order of how we switched bases:

  2. Shards

Just letting you know for all the haters or flamers who say it’s shards.
